snippet.title: The Red Bell's Lament for Nintendo Switch™ - Opening Trailer
snippet.description:
The latest from AmuLit! Check out the opening movie for The Red Bell's Lament, an upcoming download-exclusive game for the Nintendo Switch™

"Humans: fragile, fleeting, beautiful."

◆X（Twitter）
The Red Bell's Lament ：https://x.com/RedBellsLament
AmuLit：https://x.com/AmuLit_Global

◆Official Site◆
https://products.voltage.co.jp/redbell/english

◆Official Portal Site◆
https://products.voltage.co.jp/switch/english/

◆Story◆
One day, vampires appeared in the peaceful world of Hemeria.
They took everything from one single girl - and she swore revenge,
since growing into one of Hemeria's finest hunters,
She's recruited as a member of the Nyx Special Assault Forces,
which plans to invade the world of the vampires.
A shiver of anticipation crackles through her at the opportunity she's been waiting for her whole life.
However, this is but the beginning of a game wherein the fate of her world is at stake.
Pawns are sent forth, discarded, hidden out of sight... And just how many will remain when this all comes to an end?

◆Cast◆
Takuya Eguchi / Daisuke Namikawa / Nobuhiko Okamoto / Kengo Kawanishi

Mariya Ise / Minori Suzuki / Masakazu Morita / Yusuke Kobayashi / Kazuhiro Yoshimura / Hiromi Igarashi / Ayaka Fukuhara / Kohsuke Toriumi / Kanoko Akahori / Takatora Shimada / Volcano Ota / Toya Shiraishi / Yousuke Omomo / Kohei Amasaki

◆Participating Creators◆
Director: Nachi
Scenario: Yuzuki
Illustrator: Norita
Backgrounds: Minoru Akiba
BGM: Yamato
Theme: 9mm Parabellum Bullet

――――――――――――――

*AmuLit is Voltage Inc's new brand for console platforms.
*The Red Bell's Lament is the official title for Project Code Vampire Hunter, announced in 2023.
